question: A blueprint that outlines the product the company will be building, what it is going to look like, and its specific requirements and functions is known as a ________.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. A participant matrix is a project management tool used to analyze a project participant to determine the actions which are necessary to align their goals with the project.
That’s not correct. A bill of materials is a comprehensive list of raw materials, subassemblies, subcomponents, etc. and the quantities of each needed to manufacture an end product.
That’s not correct. A project scope statement provides a detailed description of the work that must be done to deliver the output of a project on time and within the allotted budget.

The purpose of a product specification is to provide a description and statement of the requirements of a product, the components of a product, the capability or performance of a product, and/or the service or work to be performed to create a product.

detailedSolution: The purpose of a product specification is to provide a description and statement of the requirements of a product, the components of a product, the capability or performance of a product, and/or the service or work to be performed to create a product.
